name: Mom Koser's Ham Loaf
comments: You can prepare the ham loaf
ingredients:
3/4 to 1 c. milk (enough so that mixture is not dry)

Sauce Ingredients:
instructions: Mix all loaf ingredients in large bowl. Place into roasting pan large enough to hold it (if you double the recipe a 9x13" pan will be fine; just make a taller loaf). Dust with flour and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Mix together sauce ingredients. Bring to a boil and pour over ham loaf. Return to oven for another half hour to an hour; it will thicken and be a sweet 'n' sour sauce.
